author: ningjiang
msg: minor improvemnet to CAMEL-1171 so that we can use to(pattern, uris...) or to(pattern, endpoints...) so if a pattern is specified with to() it is the first parameter. Also added similar inOut(endpoints...) and inOnly(...) methods. Finally added an extra ExchangePattern constructor argument to ToType so that when using [inOut|inOnly](uris|endpoints) we only need a single step in the DSL which is a tad faster & minimises copying etc

author: ctan
msg: add projectGroupId and scmRootAddress to buildContext
